title: Social Competency Enhancement Program Utilizing Learning Design Variation Mechanisms

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social science concepts and ability to use digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Development of social field practical competencies through project-based assessments in environments utilizing learners’ personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners reuse and modify three or more educational scenarios using learning design variation mechanisms.
Learners achieve 80% or higher task completion rates by applying adapted learning designs in social studies projects.
Learners improve learning outcomes by 70% or more using a trackable activity progress system within an LMS.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
